Author: trstmfckr
Text: feel you  the solution isn't to "find" something, but rather to make peace with it  in the same sense we can appreciate a sunset or a snowflake knowing that it is inherently fleeting, we can also understand that everything, us included, is just a beautiful blip  I know that's hard, and a hurdle. buddhism helped me. stoicism and/or nihilism may help too

Author: countdowntocontrol
Text: Hey there. I also get very suicidal when I binge, and it can take me to something of a crisis point. If you feel like you might harm yourself, please, please go to the hospital, call a friend, get somewhere safe where you're not alone, shoot me or somebody you love a message. I hope it gets easier very soon. Even just writing it out like that was an act of strength. Keep writing it out.
